title: Fire Pit, Skylights, Public Transportation Nearby
posting_body: Four Mile Flats offers large one and two-bedroom apartments loaded with appliances, hardwood floors, and fire places.

Relax by the pool, soak in the outdoor hot tub, exercise in our state-of-the-art fitness center, play fetch with Fido in one of our two custom dog parks, or entertain outside at one of our multiple barbecue stations or by our wood burning fireplace.
Four Mile Flats is located just east of Cherry Creek Mall, providing easy access to some of Denver’s best shopping, dining, and entertainment.
The Colorado Blvd Light Rail Station is less than a mile away, offering convenient access to downtown Denver, Mile High Stadium, The Pepsi Center, and the Tech Center.
24-Hour Fitness Center featuring Peloton Exercise Bikes
